name: Firefox: Decent Striped Floating Scrollbars
additional_info:
I wanted to resolve common issue of semi-transparent floating scrollbars: they are nearly invisible on some backgrounds. Since we cannot make it dynamically inverse according background in Fx, using two colours was only way to achieve that.

Notes:
- Restart after installation.
- Hover and dragging effect prevents flickering on LCDs.
- Screenshot is ugly, in real it is pixel-by-pixel striping.

Known issues:
- Scattered stripes while zoomed and perhaps with device pixel ratios 1.something. (Aliasing.)
- For LTR layouts only. (Too lazy to adapt.)
- Parents (eg viewport) scrollbar may cover another one of some child element inside (eg textarea). (This is common issue of all floating scrollbars I think.)
- Still may blend with similar striped background. (Unlikely.)
